name: That time I was about to do something important but
name_original: That time I was about to do something important but
description:
Update 0.1:  Fixed a bug with the plugins not loading properly!

warnings: swearing


A visual novel dating game by Crowphet & Pumpiino!!!

When you open the game, go to the options and change the font. Arial is soo much better than the default RPG Maker...

If you stream the game or want to give feedback, please don't hesitate to reach me at https://twitter.com/Pumpiino!!
